title: Prometheus Alerts Chart Values Schema
description: Schema to validate the values.yaml for Prometheus alerts Helm chart.

global.description: Global settings for alert rules and metadata.

alertLabels.description: Labels to be applied to all alerts unless overridden by specific alert labels.

additionalProperties.description: A label key-value pair for the alerts.

metadata.description: Global metadata to define project and other details.

partOf.description: Project name or part of metadata.

alertRules.description: List of alert rules to be created.

alertName.description: The name of the alert rule.

expression.description: The Prometheus expression (query) that defines the alert condition.

for.description: Duration for which the condition must be true before the alert is fired.

description.description: A description of what this alert is about.

summary.description: A brief summary of the alert.

labels.description: Labels specific to this alert rule, which override global labels if defined.

additionalProperties.description: A label key-value pair for the specific alert rule.
